solution_line_template: In each compartment, there are {initial_pennies_per_compartment} pennies, and when she adds {added_pennies_per_compartment} pennies to each compartment, one compartment will have {added_pennies_per_compartment}+{initial_pennies_per_compartment} = {pennies_per_compartment_after_addition} pennies.

If there are {num_compartments} compartments, and each compartment now contains {pennies_per_compartment_after_addition} pennies, there are a total of {num_compartments}*{pennies_per_compartment_after_addition} = <<{num_compartments}*{pennies_per_compartment_after_addition}={total_pennies}>>{total_pennies} pennies in all the compartments.
